name: Retro coffee pot with grunge texture
description: Retro coffee pot Material: painted metal with abrasions and rust. Model in 2 versions: 1) with a grid of 3440 and 2) with a grid of 13516 (for close-up) Texture format: jpg., 4k For Corona render, it is recommended to install at least version 1.5, as the glossiness of the materials is adjusted with PBR in mind.
